ovdesc.p: This application holds details of total invoices uploaded,processed and errors grouped by currency.
ID of this system maintained file will be EB.FILE.UPLOAD id with time stamp.

desc.p: Identifies the upload reference from uploaded file thru' EB.FILE.UPLOAD application.
Identifies the total invoices uploaded thru' EB.FILE.UPLOAD application.
Associated multi-value set with fields DOC.CCY and DOC.VALUE.
Identifies the currency of the uploaded invoice.
Associated multi-value set.
Identifies the total invoice amount uploaded for each currency.
Associated multi-value set.
Identifies the total invoices processed successfully by creating BL.REGISTER.
Associated multi-value set with fields PROC.DOC.CCY and PROC.DOC.VALUE.
Identifies the currency of the uploaded invoice which are successfully processed.
Associated multi-value set.
Identifies the total invoice amount which are successfully processed.
Associated multi-value set.
Identifies the total invoices in errors which has failed during creation of BL.REGISTER.
Associated multi-value set with fields ERR.DOC.CCY and ERR.DOC.VALUE.
Identifies the currency of the uploaded invoice which are in error.
Associated multi-value set.
Identifies the total invoice amount which are in error.
Associated multi-value set.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
